title: The White Sobremak website calls for attacks on Jews on the Internet in Whitefish, Montana.
subtitle: A call to action by the Daley Stormer revealed the names and personal contact information of the Jewish people who claimed to be "Harasis and Abzoa" of Richard Spencer's white extremist parents.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The "daily storm" called for "lethal storm" of revenge against the Jews in Whitefish, Montana, who accused them of causing economic hardship to Richard Spencer's white extremist parents.
